title: The Guide to Streaming Meryl Streep in December
description:
Juliet Litman and Amanda Dobbins break down two new Meryl Streep movies currently available on streaming, 'The Prom' on Netflix and 'Let Them All Talk' on HBO Max.

Hosts: Juliet Litman and Amanda Dobbins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
